description: An illustration of a slot machine game; the display is yellow and orange and there is a diamond at the top of the machine. The screen shows nine different shapes: the first row has a black and orange rectangle, then a yellow and orange square, and another black and orange rectangle; the second row shows three orange rhombuses in a row; the third row shows a yellow and orange square, a black and green square, and another yellow and orange square. The lever to the machine is on the righthand side. The illustration is made out of a series of triangles of various sizes.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
